roles.description: Manages and maintains IoT infrastructure, including devices, gateways, and cloud services. Monitors performance and ensures uptime.
permission: Administers IoT platforms and databases. Configures and troubleshoots connectivity issues. Implements backup and recovery procedures.

roles.description: Oversees IoT deployment projects from inception to completion. Coordinates teams, manages resources, and ensures project goals are met.
permission: Plans project timelines, allocates budgets, and coordinates with stakeholders. Manages risks and escalates issues as needed.

roles.description: Designs and develops hardware components for IoT devices. Selects components, prototypes circuits, and conducts performance testing.
permission: Accesses hardware design tools, testing equipment, and manufacturing processes. Collaborates with software engineers for integration.

roles.description: Designs and implements networks for IoT systems. Configures routers, gateways, and protocols to ensure reliable connectivity.
permission: Manages network configurations and security settings. Monitors network traffic and optimizes performance for IoT data transmission.

roles.description: Creates user interfaces and experiences for IoT applications. Designs intuitive interfaces and conducts usability testing.
permission: Develops wireframes, prototypes, and graphical assets. Collaborates with developers to ensure seamless integration and user interaction.

roles.description: Ensures IoT systems and operations comply with regulatory requirements and industry standards. Conducts audits and risk assessments.
permission: Develops compliance policies and procedures. Interfaces with legal and regulatory bodies. Provides training on compliance issues.

roles.description: Operates and maintains 3D printers, ensures prints meet quality standards, troubleshoots technical issues.
permissions: Access to 3D printing equipment, materials, and software; ability to modify printer settings.

roles.description: Develops new materials suitable for 3D printing, tests material properties, and optimizes printing parameters.
permissions: Access to laboratory facilities, equipment for material testing, authority to modify printing parameters.

roles.description: Creates 3D models and designs using Computer-Aided Design software, prepares files for printing.
permissions: Access to CAD software, ability to design and modify 3D models, collaborate with engineers and clients.

roles.description: Inspects finished 3D printed parts for accuracy, strength, and dimensional correctness.
permissions: Access to quality control tools and equipment, authority to reject or approve parts based on quality standards.

roles.description: Oversees 3D printing operations, schedules jobs, manages workflow and resources.
permissions: Authority to allocate resources, schedule production runs, ensure adherence to production schedules.

roles.description: Conducts research on new 3D printing technologies, materials, and applications.
permissions: Access to research facilities, funding for experimental studies, authority to publish findings.

roles.description: Provides technical expertise to customers, demonstrates capabilities of 3D printing systems, and advises on applications.
permissions: Access to sales tools and resources, authority to negotiate contracts, collaborate with marketing teams.

roles.description: Performs routine maintenance and repairs on 3D printers and associated equipment.
permissions: Access to maintenance tools and spare parts, authority to schedule maintenance tasks.

roles.description: Manages supply chain logistics for 3D printing materials, parts, and equipment.
permissions: Authority to negotiate supplier contracts, manage inventory levels, optimize supply chain efficiency.

roles.description: Ensures workplace safety and compliance with environmental regulations related to 3D printing operations.
permissions: Authority to conduct safety audits, implement safety protocols, train personnel on safe practices.

roles.description: Manages and oversees the export operations of goods or services, ensuring compliance with international trade regulations and agreements.
permissions: Ensure compliance with export laws and regulations

roles.description: Ensures that all imported goods comply with customs regulations and international trade laws.
permissions: Review import documentation and customs declarations

roles.description: Manages financial aspects of international trade transactions, including letters of credit, export financing, and currency exchange.
permissions: Facilitate letters of credit and payment guarantees
Evaluate credit risk of international clients
Manage currency hedging and exchange rate risk

roles.description: Facilitates the clearance of goods through customs, ensuring compliance with import/export regulations and tariff classifications.
permissions: Classify goods according to tariff schedules

roles.description: Leads a team responsible for selling products or services to international markets, developing strategies to expand market share globally.
permissions: Develop international sales plans and strategies

roles.description: Analyzes and monitors trade activities to ensure compliance with international trade laws, regulations, and sanctions.
Coordinates the transportation and delivery of goods across international borders, optimizing logistics processes for efficiency.
permissions: Coordinate with customs brokers and carriers

roles.description: Provides legal counsel and representation to businesses involved in international trade disputes, compliance, and negotiations.
permissions: Draft international trade agreements and contracts
Represent clients in trade dispute resolutions

roles.description: Oversees the entire supply chain process, ensuring efficiency and compliance with international trade regulations.
Analyzes economic trends and policies impacting international trade, providing insights and forecasts for global markets.
permissions: Provide policy recommendations for international trade

roles.description: Analyzes market trends, evaluates digital currency performance, and provides insights for investment decisions.
permission: Access to trading data and analytics platforms.

roles.description: Develops and maintains blockchain protocols, smart contracts, and decentralized applications (dApps).
permission: Access to blockchain networks and development tools.

roles.description: Executes trades in cryptocurrencies based on market analysis and trading strategies.
permission: Access to trading platforms and exchange accounts.

roles.description: Ensures compliance with regulatory requirements and anti-money laundering (AML) policies in cryptocurrency transactions.
permission: Access to transaction data and compliance tools.

roles.description: Designs and develops secure digital wallets for storing cryptocurrencies and managing transactions.
permission: Access to wallet encryption technologies and security protocols.

roles.description: Reports on news and developments in the cryptocurrency industry, interviews key figures, and provides market analysis.
permission: Access to industry contacts and research resources.

roles.description: Manages financial records and prepares reports for cryptocurrency transactions, ensuring accuracy and compliance.
permission: Access to transaction records and accounting software.

roles.description: Manages operations of a cryptocurrency exchange platform, oversees trading activities, and ensures platform security.
permission: Access to exchange infrastructure and security systems.

roles.description: Develops and implements marketing strategies to promote cryptocurrencies and attract investors and users.
permission: Access to marketing analytics and communication channels.

roles.description: Provides legal advice and guidance on regulatory compliance, token offerings, and cryptocurrency transactions.
permission: Access to legal databases and compliance resources.

roles.description: Designs and develops chemical processes and equipment, conducts research, and analyzes data to improve production efficiency and safety.
Ensures that chemical products meet regulatory standards and internal quality requirements through testing and analysis.
Manages environmental compliance and safety protocols within chemical manufacturing facilities to prevent hazards and ensure regulatory compliance.
Conducts research to develop new chemicals, improve existing products, and innovate manufacturing processes.
Oversees the day-to-day operations of chemical production lines, ensuring adherence to production schedules and quality standards.
permissions: Access to production reports and metrics

roles.description: Manages the procurement of raw materials and distribution of finished chemical products to ensure efficient supply chain operations.
Operates and maintains chemical processing equipment, monitors process parameters, and troubleshoots equipment issues to ensure continuous operation.
permissions: Authorization to operate chemical processing equipment

roles.description: Ensures compliance with local and international regulations for chemical products, manages regulatory submissions, and monitors regulatory changes.
Develops marketing strategies, manages sales activities, and cultivates relationships with customers to promote chemical products and achieve sales targets.
Plans and executes maintenance activities for chemical production equipment to ensure optimal performance and minimize downtime.
Responsible for designing, coding, and testing game features.
Creates the overall concept and storyline of the game.
Tests games to identify bugs and ensure quality.
Oversees the visual style and artistic elements of the game.
Manages the game's development process and team.
Creates and integrates audio elements into the game.
Develops and executes marketing strategies for the game.
Engages with the game's community and manages communications.
Bridges the gap between artists
Develops strategies to generate revenue from the game.
Oversees the production process of wine and spirits, ensuring quality and efficiency.
Ensures that wine and spirits meet the company's quality standards and regulatory requirements.
Promotes and sells wine and spirits to retailers, distributors, and customers.
Develops and implements marketing strategies to promote wine and spirits brands.
Manages the distribution and transportation of wine and spirits to ensure timely delivery.
Analyzes supply chain data to improve efficiency and reduce costs in the production and distribution of wine and spirits.
Oversees the financial operations, including budgeting, forecasting, and financial reporting, in the wine and spirits sector.
Provides support to customers, addressing their inquiries and resolving issues related to wine and spirits products.
Conducts research to develop new wine and spirits products and improve existing ones.
Manages warehouse operations, including inventory management and order fulfillment, in the wine and spirits sector.
Designs and manages the cloud architecture of an organization.
Implements and maintains cloud infrastructure solutions.
Ensures the security of cloud systems and data.
Facilitates development and operations by automating processes and managing cloud deployments.
Provides technical support for cloud services and infrastructure.
Develops applications and services for cloud environments.
Advises organizations on cloud strategies and solutions.
Manages and optimizes cloud-based data storage and processing.
Oversees the day-to-day operations of cloud infrastructure.
Designs and manages network configurations in cloud environments.
Conducts research and development in biofuels technology, focusing on improving efficiency and sustainability.
Designs, implements, and optimizes biofuel production processes, ensuring compliance with environmental regulations.
Monitors and ensures the quality of biofuels produced, conducting tests and inspections to meet industry standards.
Oversees the supply chain operations for biofuel production, from raw material procurement to product distribution.
Ensures that biofuel production processes comply with environmental regulations and sustainability standards.
Manages the day-to-day operations of biofuel production facilities, overseeing staff and maintaining production schedules.
Performs routine maintenance and repairs on biofuel production equipment to ensure optimal operation.
Identifies new business opportunities and partnerships to expand the market reach of biofuels.
Supports research activities by preparing samples, conducting experiments, and maintaining lab equipment.
Manages regulatory submissions and communications with governmental bodies to ensure compliance with biofuel regulations.
Responsible for creating engaging and relevant content for social media platforms.
Oversees social media strategy, manages content calendars, and analyzes performance metrics.
Engages with the online community, moderates discussions, and addresses user concerns.
Analyzes data from social media platforms to track performance and trends.
Manages and optimizes paid advertising campaigns on social media platforms.
Designs visual content such as images, infographics, and video graphics for social media.
Develops and implements long-term social media strategies aligned with business goals.
Manages relationships with influencers and coordinates influencer marketing campaigns.
Handles customer inquiries and issues through social media channels.
Assists in the day-to-day management of social media accounts and content scheduling.
Responsible for designing, implementing, and managing satellite communication networks.
Manages the operation of satellite systems, ensuring optimal performance and addressing any anomalies.
Maintains and operates equipment at ground stations that communicate with satellites.
Designs and oversees the development of satellite systems, ensuring they meet required specifications.
Analyzes satellite communication data to optimize performance and identify potential improvements.
Oversees the operations and strategic planning of satellite communication systems.
Designs and optimizes radio frequency (RF) systems for satellite communications.
Provides technical support for satellite communication systems to ensure minimal downtime.
Focuses on the design and management of the payload components of satellites.
Advises on the best practices and strategies for satellite communication systems.
Responsible for designing and planning space missions, including trajectory analysis, mission timelines, and coordination with various teams.
permissions: Coordinate with engineering and science teams

roles.description: Oversees the execution of space missions from the ground, making real-time decisions and coordinating with mission control teams.
Designs and tests spacecraft, launch vehicles, and related systems to ensure they meet mission requirements and safety standards.
permissions: Access to design and simulation software

roles.description: Studies the physical properties of celestial objects and phenomena to support mission objectives and scientific research.
permissions: Access to astronomical data and analysis tools

roles.description: Manages the day-to-day operations of satellites, including monitoring health status, performing maneuvers, and troubleshooting issues.
permissions: Respond to anomalies and perform troubleshooting

roles.description: Ensures the integration and functionality of all spacecraft subsystems, working closely with various engineering teams.
Responsible for overseeing the preparation and execution of spacecraft launches, ensuring all systems and teams are ready.
permissions: Access to launch procedures and checklists

roles.description: Manages the integration, testing, and operation of scientific instruments and other payloads on spacecraft.
permissions: Access to payload design and integration documents

roles.description: Provides medical expertise and support for astronauts, including pre-flight health assessments and in-flight medical care.
permissions: Develop medical protocols for space missions

roles.description: Designs, maintains, and operates the ground-based systems and infrastructure that support space missions.
permissions: Access to ground system design documents
Coordinate with mission control and engineering teams

roles.description: Leads the creative team, oversees the artistic development of marketing and promotional pieces, including print, online, mobile, and television advertisements.
Acts as the liaison between the client and the creative team, manages client accounts, ensures that client needs are met, and projects are delivered on time.
Creates engaging, persuasive, and clear copy for various advertising mediums including print, digital, and broadcast.
Develops the visual aspects of advertising campaigns, collaborates with designers, and ensures a cohesive visual style across various media.
Determines the best media outlets to advertise a client's product or service, plans media campaigns, and negotiates with media outlets.
Manages a company’s social media presence, creates and curates content, engages with followers, and analyzes performance metrics.
Creates visual content for advertisements, including digital graphics, print layouts, and other visual media.
Conducts research to understand consumer behavior, market trends, and the effectiveness of advertising strategies.
Optimizes website content to improve search engine rankings and drive organic traffic to the site.
Oversees advertising projects from inception to completion, ensuring they are delivered on time, within scope, and budget.
